title: How to Disable Voice Calls on Telegram

steps.title: Launch the Telegram app on your Android device.
steps.content: Launch the Telegram app on your Android device. It's a round icon depicting a paper aeroplane on a blue background. You can find it in your home screen or app drawer.

steps.title: Tap the menu ☰ icon.
steps.content: Tap the menu ☰ icon. The triple bar icon is located in the upper-left corner of the app. Tapping it will open the menu panel.

steps.title: Tap the Settings option.
steps.content: Tap the Settings option. It’s near the bottom of the menu with a gear icon.

steps.title: Tap Privacy and Security.
steps.content: Tap Privacy and Security . You will see this option under the “Notification and Sounds ” settings.

steps.title: Select Calls from the “Privacy” section.
steps.content: Select Calls from the “Privacy ” section. This will open the voice calls settings page.

steps.title: Disable the voice call feature for your account.
steps.content: Disable the voice call feature for your account. Navigate to the “Who can call me? ” title and select Nobody from the options.

steps.title: Save your changes.
steps.content: Save your changes. Tap on the check mark ( ✓ ) icon, at the top-right corner, to apply your changes. Once you have done that, nobody can call you through the Telegram app. Done!

steps.title: Launch the Telegram app.
steps.content: Launch the Telegram app. It’s a blue icon with a white paper aeroplane. Use the Start menu to find it quickly.

steps.title: Open the Menu panel by click on the ☰ icon.
steps.content: Open the Menu panel by click on the ☰ icon. It's located at the top-right corner of the app.

steps.title: Click on Settings from the menu panel.
steps.content: Click on Settings from the menu panel. It will be the second to last option.

steps.title: Click on the Privacy and Security option.
steps.content: Click on the Privacy and Security option. It's located right after the “Notification ” settings.

steps.title: Click on Voice calls.
steps.content: Click on Voice calls . It will be the third option in the “Privacy ” section.

steps.title: Disable the voice call feature.
steps.content: Disable the voice call feature. Navigate to the “Who can call me ” section and select Nobody from the options.

steps.title: Click on SAVE to apply your changes.
steps.content: Click on SAVE to apply your changes. When you have done that, no one can call you in Telegram. Finished!
